TEXT.TITLE: OMNICARE INC <OCR> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Shr profit five cts vs loss one ct Net profit 504,000 vs loss 102,000 Revs 31.4 mln vs 32.0 mln Nine mths Shr profit 17 cts vs profit 26 cts Net profit 1,729,000 vs profit 2,596,000 Revs 92.7 mln vs 112.6 mln NOTE: 1986 3rd qtr net includes a after-tax charge of 555,000 dlrs for sale of Reliacare Inc.
1986 nine mths net includes charge of 1,253,000 dlrs or 12 cts a share for sale of Reliacare and Inspiron Hospital Products division. 1986 nine mths net also includes aftertax earnings of 2,256,000 dlrs or 22 dlrs a share for American Medical International Inc <AMI> contracts which expired July 1986. Reuter
